a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Plastic waste accumulated in aquatic environments
The amount of plastic waste that has accumulated in aquatic environments since 1951. This is calculated as the
running total of inputs each year.

g.text: Asia (excl. China and India)Asia (excl. China and India)

text.tspan: Note: Regional aggregates were calculated by Our World in Data and are based on those specified by the OECD.
